name: Power Racing Bundle 2
summary: Enjoy 2 games in 1 with this irresistible speed games pack! Speed Truck Racing Get ready to feel the speed! In Speed Truck Racing you'll enjoy the dirtiest, fastest, and most spectacular races at speeds over 200 Km/h, avoiding multiple collisions against 10 adversaries. The game has different modes, such as Championship, Arcade, and 4-player multiplayer. WildTrax Racing Get ready to feel the wild! In WildTrax Racing you will enjoy the wildest and most spectacular races in natural environments. You will have several game modes such as Arcade and 4-player multiplayer. Features: -Arcade driving -4-Player Multiplayer -Online ranking If you prefer, you can also purchase them separately on the Nintendo eShop.
